subject: ORDER CANCELLATION #SSN5433
description_text:
Hello I would like to cancel my order (#SSN5433) because I forgot to add
the flat base.
Kind regards, Ludovic Nunes

conversations.body_text: Hi Ludovic Nunes,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your order has already been shipped, and we will do our best to intercept it for you.

Hello I see that I will receive the order (#SSN5433) today I pick up the
package and I send it back to you or I don't pick it up?
Sincerely Ludovic Nunes


Le mer. 31 déc. 2025 à 10:02, service@simsonn.com

Hello, I'm contacting you again because I received the order(#SSN5433), but
I haven't opened it yet and I'm ready to return it. I imagine I'll need a
return label. I await your reply. Sincerely, Ludovic Nunes


Le mar. 6 janv. 2026 à 00:32, NES 7 <nunes63bmt@gmail.com> a écrit :

> Hello I see that I will receive the order (#SSN5433) today I pick up the
> package and I send it back to you or I don't pick it up?
> Sincerely Ludovic Nunes
>
>
> Le mer. 31 déc. 2025 à 10:02, service@simsonn.com

Hi Ludovic Nunes,    We're sorry to hear about this unfortunate situation, but we generally cannot accept returns for products without defects. Since iron products are prone to scratches and other signs of use, we are typically unable to resell them. If your product is in perfect condition, you may return the package to our Germany warehouse. We will process your refund after receiving and inspecting the item. However, please ensure the packaging is intact and the product shows no signs of use—otherwise, your return request will not be approved! Gubitz GmbH(LeiXuan A211) Hüttenkamp 12 Neumünster,Schleswig-Holstein   24536 +49 17622233089
